title: Rahu Transit in Seventh House: Unconventional Partnerships, Attraction, and Clarity Tests
summary: For Aquarius Ascendant, Rahu transiting the seventh house reshapes partnerships, alliances, and public dealings. Strong attraction toward unconventional people or foreign connections emerges. Business collaborations can expand quickly, but clarity of terms is essential to avoid confusion. In relationships, intensity and novelty rise, yet expectations may swing. Public image becomes prominent through strategic associations. When transparency, boundaries, and ethics guide choices, Rahu here brings growth via partnerships without instability or misalignment.
closing: Rahu in the seventh house succeeds when partnerships are built with clarity, ethics, and boundaries.
